content: **freebie pattern for ravellenics 2022 - if you d like to jknit along with the stitchnerds team you ll be very welcome - stitchnerds /groups/stitchnerds other ravellenic patterns - bundle 1 mosaic knitting and the boomerang shape are 2 of my favourite things in knitting so i decided that one of this year s ravellenic freebie patterns would include both if you ve never tried mosaic knitting before this might be the time it s an easy way to get colour effects - you only work with one colour per row the stitches in the other colour are slipped to form the motif this is quite a simple motif - good for a beginner or for a knitter of any ability who wants to concentrate more on the onscreen action than their knitting you can make a small accessory version with about 200m/220yds of each yarn topline of approx 150cm/60 or simply allow more yarn if you want it to be bigger and wear it more like a shawl you can knit with any yarn weight - you can even have one difference in weight between the yarns - just be sure to have good contrast between all the colours in the contrast yarn and the main yarn **pattern is charted only** if you d like to make a cowl with the same stitch - link 2 1 https //www ravelry com/bundles/ravellenics-2022-2 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/from-russia-with-wool-
